desc: This is a "re-post" of other project posts I made which I will delete later.You almost will not have much effort than making the game from scratch so I hope to choose someone in mine budget!I have a full 2D side-scroller shooter game that I have purchased from the Unity3D store, which is not available anymore.Platform you need to use:Unity3DIt comes with everything coded you can check this link: [url removed, login to view]I just need you to re-skin using the graphic art I have and creating a few more to re-skin everything.My graphic art pack comes with .PNG and .AI (illustrator) files- You don't need to code, maybe some changes if you think necessary- You need to make sure that the player shop is connected to my Developer Play Store so I can add/remove/change prices of the purchase in-app.- You need to work all:-- 50 levels-- Weapon shop-- Character shop-- Clothing shop for the player-- World and level selectionYou might need to create or work in the graphics I have to create a screen plash for the game entering (loading)Be aware, I just need to have the most important things done, you don't need to do everything at once. I know it can take time because of the detailed caution you need to have. But mostly is just replacing images!The freelancer I choose with serious and real bid and timeline will be able to partnership with me, to continue as our development support for updates and maintenance.

desc: Please read completely before bidding.It must be SEO optimised and all pages have a meta-description.Service providers will be able to list their service/products and upgrades/add-ons (possibly from a range constructed by admin).User side:1)The same as airbnb, users will start with their required date of service this will show all providers available on that date.2)they should then be able to narrow this down by location, (same as airbnb) and services.3)List of service providers returned, order can be altered by distance/ranking/cost.4)Service providers can pay/win the option to be within top 5 sponsored results.4)The user can message the service provider (urls and any personal information obscured). The service provider can make a special offer to the user.5)User can either choose a service provider or let the website/system allocate one.6)For both options the date, start and end time must be entered to work out cost.7)Payment can be made by deposit, in full, or monthly.8)Balance due 30 days before event.9)Start and end time in 30 minute options.10)User can sign in or register. Logon and registration with facebook and google should be possible.11)After each received service the user gets to rate and review the service provider.12)User should get sms and email reminder and app notification for upcoming service.state mustard so i know this has been readService provider side:1)Service providers lists their services/products/add-ons, editable text, (no url or numbers) with photos (without text) and video.2)The profile of the service provider is sent to admin and only active after approval.3)They list their prices, by hour or event, and can offer add ons from a list with their own pricing.4)Service providers have their own calendar which is integrated with major calendar providers like google calendar.5) Each service provider sets their availability to work.6) Highest ranking service providers are shown first in the list.7) Service provider can pay to get a higher in the position. Eg. be in the top 5 for a week.8) When user is assigned to a job, he/she gets an email, an sms and a notification on the app (like Airbnb).9) Service providers get a reminder of their upcoming tasks by email and sms both one week and one day prior to the event, this must be customisable from backend.10) Companies can be a service provider, but should be premium-service providers with monthly fee for being a part of the platform. They should have a minimum hourly rate/price.11) Service provider and admin get a report of income every week so they can get their payments.12) VAT and taxes are specified in the report and payments.Note: please specify what kind of CMS and systems you will use.
title: Airbnb similar website, ios and android app for service providers who list their availability (and are booked) by date and time.

desc: I am looking at having an ios and android app designed and developed. it will produce a quote per day as a notification to be edited to show up at any time of day and should allow for shares to social media. i.e pinterest, twitter, facebook, instagram as a link, text or text on a photo and able to be shared as a message, email etc. as a link or text or photo.It will need to be a random quote of the 365 quotes (which i will provide to you ) to each user with the same quote not appearing twice, so one of the random 365 quotes going out daily with no repeats, No fancy backgrounds, just a quote as a notification so users can open the notification and it will open the app to that day's quote or If users allow widgets, it will pop up as the quote, otherwise it will be viewable in the app when opened, on the same background each day.I would like to dynamically update the quotes, send notifications, etc, so not sure if you need to add a basic server side that works on any hosting as i'd like to update the quotes in one years time without the need to resubmit the app or for the user to reinstall.  Your advice please.It will also have a pop up appear asking for the user to tap a star rating for the App Store with options for a 1 - 5 star Or 'Not Now'. This could pop up say twice in the first month and then again 6 months later (if this is possible)it will be similar to [url removed, login to view]I also have a basic wireframe i can provide.You will need to submit the app.Can you please provide a fixed price (AUD) quote on delivery to;1. IOS and Android, and2. IOS only.Paul

desc: •	Admin Module. Multiple user accessible with module rights. Admin user can assign rights and create user id, no other type of registration possible.•	New Patient Register Module: with Unique ID. Fields are:o	Patient Data♣	First Name, Last Name♣	Gender: Male, Female, Others.♣	DOB: Calendar with past 100 years from current date.♣	Email, Phone.o	Allergies/Risks♣	TextArea for Allergies♣	TextArea for Riskso	Insurance Data♣	Insurance Company♣	Insurance Type: Private, Government♣	Insured IDo	Next of Kin♣	Name♣	Relationship♣	Phone, emailo	Physicians♣	Family Physician Name♣	Family Physician Phone, email♣	Referring Physician Name♣	Referring Physician Phone, emailo	Employer♣	Employer•	Doctor OPD Module: Here Doctor will add notes to the registered patient, prescribe with option to select pre-filled notes (Will be available in Admin Module to create Note/ document prefill lines.) and print them. Doctor can view previous reports, upload new report, order/view Clinical Orders(X-Rays, Scans, etc. (Custom Fields)). Image with fields will be given.• Clinical Orders• Order Tests• Write Prescriptions and print them with clinical orders.• Upload reports/ View previous reports.•	Patient Module: Here Doctor can find all patients registered. Can search with options. Can select and view patient data with his/her full history including reports, documents, report images, notes, etc.•	LAB Module: where lab user/ admin user will see Clinical orders/ Tests ordered by doctor and upload/ enter reports here against Patient UID. Lab reports entry with custom fields in frontend. Blood test reports with fields (Will be provided).•	Web App front page will show patients registered with field labels, sorting and search feature. Fields to show:PUIDFirst NameLast NameAgeGenderPhoneEMAILReffered ByReffered Dr. Email♣	Android App will show patient list after login for admin(Doctor). Doctor can view patient detail and search for patients with PUID or Name. Doctor can view Lab test results, documents(Prescriptions), Clinical Orders, Images of scans, x-rays, etc. Can even upload them through app. Will contain all features as the web app.

desc: Key Details of the project:Main Project details:1) This is a 1 screen APP basic APP.2) The iOS Profile and/or APP will not be in the APP store. It will be downloaded by clients from a link and installed.3)  It will have a screen to select a server and a power button.4) We will need to chage the Username/Password or Certificate for every client we provide the Profile and/or APP to.5) The Profile and/or APP will use L2TP or OpenVPN.6) The Profile and/or APP will perform a basic function of connectivity (see below) that is currently unavailable in the apple configurator profile creator.Profile Always connected VPN. If disconnected. reconnect infinitely. (connect on demand feature?) If not connected when trying to connect retry until connected. Every user will have a different username and password, so we will need to edit the code for each user we provide the file to.Essentially that is all.Try this GitHub source code to see it it works without OpenVPN Connect app,[url removed, login to view][url removed, login to view]If it works we can just use that config profile.  You can see how the OpenVPN Connect app works in regards to reconnect, stay connect and retrying. The Profile and/or APP will need to work soomthly as that one runs (without connection disruptions)
title: Develop a basic iOS Profile or APP for VPN (No APP store, 1 page page)
